name: Forehead Circus
description:
Survive in a creepy park without letting the clowns slap your comically large forehead!

Criteria:

  • Atmospheric- The park is meant to have an atmosphere of a desolate circus,  getting around and exploring is ideal, the only real 'objective' is 'don't get slapped'
  • Carnival- The setting, again, is meant to be carnival-like. Plus your enemies are clowns.
  • Eerie Music- Music is used to complement the atmosphere.
  • Wasi- Your lose condition is to get slapped in the forehead with great force

Assets used not made by me during the jam period retrieved from:

https://opengameart.org/content/marionettes

http://soundbible.com/2047-Banana-Slap.html
